name: Phantom Seeds
summary: Une is your average village girl. Her life changes after her father found a young boy named Yun and adopted him. Une is happy for having a little brother, but that happiness is short-lived. The villagers believe that Yun is responsible for many calamities in the village. Une does not want to believe that, but she cannot deny that Yun is indeed a boy with many mysteries.
info:
• 中文名: 幽灵之种
  • 别名: 幻影之种
  • 平台: Web
  • 游戏类型: Drama, Supernatural
  • 游戏引擎: Flash

  • 售价: Free
